title: Taking the leap into developing as a contractor
abstract:
So how do you do it? How do you take the leap out from working for someone else, to running your own contracting business?  Where will your first clients come from?  How can you work efficiently and stay sane when working mostly by yourself? 
Contracting and freelancing can be one of the most exciting and rewarding styles of working, and it can offer some of the best perks you could ask â€“ freedom, flexibility, control over your own earning capacity, and project variation.
In this session, Bron will share her experiences from running her own freelance/contracting development business for the last 10 years, passing on tips and tactics to get started, keep going and make it the best decision you ever made!
The last 15 minutes or so of the talk will be dedicated to answering all the burning questions that you may have on starting your own contracting business.
